history.proof: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 H1 H2 H3. unfold substituteTerms. induction ts. - reflexivity. - f_equal. + apply subTermExch; auto. + apply IHts; auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
Formula: Set
Formulas: Set
System: Type
Term: Set
Terms: nat -> Set
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
orH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
andH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
existH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
iffH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
SysPrf: fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : Term), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Functions = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Functions : Language -> Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol
Relations = fun l : Language => let (Relations, Functions, _) := l in Relations : Language -> Set
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol
Trying to mask the absolute name "Terms"! [masking-absolute-name,deprecated]
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> list nat
substituteTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Terms L n -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n
subTermExch : forall (t : Term) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : Term), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v2 s2) v1 s1
subTermsTrans : forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : Term), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerms L n ts)) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 (var v2)) v2 s = substituteTerms L n ts v1 s
subTermTrans : forall (t : Term) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : Term), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerm L t)) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 (var v2)) v2 s = substituteTerm L t v1 s
subTermsNil : forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v : nat) (s : Term), ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> substituteTerms L n ts v s = ts
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v : nat) (s : Term) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v : nat) (s : Term) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> fol.Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : fol.Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n) Arguments fol.var _ _%nat_scope Arguments fol.Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
freeVarSubTerms3 : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : Term) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerms L n ts)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)

freeVarSubTerms1 : forall (n : nat) (ts : Terms n) (v : nat) (s : Term) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))

Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t

substituteFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (f : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L n f) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L (fol.forallH L n f)}
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L) (t0 : fol.Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P n t
Tcons : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), fol.Term L -> fol.Terms L n -> fol.Terms L (S n)
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, P f0 -> P (fol.impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : fol.Formula L, P f -> P (fol.notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L), (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (fol.forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4

```coq
intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 H1 H2 H3.
unfold substituteTerms.
induction ts.
- reflexivity.
- simpl. f_equal.
  + apply subTermExch; assumption.
  + apply IHts; assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros n ts v1 v2 s1 s2 H1 H2 H3. unfold substituteTerms. induction ts. - reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. + apply subTermExch; auto. + apply IHts; auto.
